page.title: 06TELEVISION AND RADIO
page.content: We sent a questionnaire to all the homes of the children in the school to find out more about what people watched on the television and listened to on the radio. TELEVISION The favourite programmes were sport and Coronation Street. Dallas and Crossroads were also very popular. Most people spent at least some of their time each day watching the television, and the most popular channels were I.T.V. and B.B.C.1. RADIO The most popular radio channel was Radio 1 with 2CR, the local radio, a close second. Again, most people spent some of their time each day listening to the radio, but tended to do something else at the same time.
